item.title: Reel to Real: When Artificial Intelligence Becomes the Spy in Your Home—and Mind
item.description: Acclaimed thriller author James Grady says films and fiction have become all too reliable guideposts to AI robots bending us to their will

item.title: Another horrifying shooting by federal agents in Minneapolis
item.description: What happens when armed men are given impunity

item.title: What Xi Jinping’s purge of China’s most senior general reveals
item.description: A purge of the military high command, unmatched since Mao’s death, may affect China’s ability to fight

item.title: Europe remains dangerously reliant on American arms
item.description: Defence spending is rising, but strategic autonomy is years away
